Reference

All functions

aggregate_biomass

NEFSC survey data broken into season and aggregate group biomass

aquaculture

Oyster aquaculture

bennet

Bennet indicator

blue_runner

SAFMC managed Blue Runner presence on NES

bottom_temp

Bottom temperature

bottom_temp_glorys

Bottom temperature - GLORYS

calanus_stage

Calanus Stage

ches_bay_wq

Chesapeake Bay Water Quality Attainment

chl_pp

Chlorophyll a and primary production

ch_bay_sal

Chesapeake Bay 2018 - 2019 salinity with historical trends for comapirson

coast

Coast

cold_pool

Cold pool index

cold_pool_sf

Cold pool sf index

comdat

Aggregated commercial fisheries data

commercial_div

Commercial fisheries diversity

ecodata

ecodata: indicator data for reporting ecosystem health

energy_density

Forage fish energy density

engagement

Commercial and recreational fishery social-economic indicators

epu_sf

Ecological Production Units

exp_n

Expected Number of Species per 1000 Individuals

forage_anomaly

Forage Anomaly

geom_gls()

A geom to fit a GLS model to a time series

grayseal

Gray Seal Bycatch

gsi

Gulf Stream Index

Habitat Occupancy

Habitat Vulnerability

Marine heatwaves within 2019

Highly Migratory Species Category

Highly Migratory Species Catch per Unit Effort

Highly Migratory Species Landings and Revenue

Harbor porpoise density estimates

Long-term SST

Package Title

A ggplot2 theme for facetted SOE time series figures

A ggplot2 theme for SOE map figures

A ggplot2 theme for SOE time series figures

Warm core rings spun off of gulf stream
